Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbal-Crew.

I have a problem with the wings from my airplane.

When I press up and down (w/s), my front wings go down, but my back wings go up. (See screenshot).

All wings (and parent parts) are rotated the same way.

Any idea?

Thanks alot

Edited May 26, 2013 by Shigerux

This is to make your pitch go up and down. It's supposed to happen, I believe. The winglets in front are rotating to bring the nose up, while the winglets at the back or rotating to bring the back down.
It is because of where the center of mass is. The wings will act differently based on their relation to the center of mass.

Yes this indeed the way it's supposed to be...

Why would you want to change this? What are you trying to achieve? Because this is generally what you want.

Yes this indeed the way it's supposed to be...

Why would you want to change this? What are you trying to achieve? Because this is generally what you want.

Oh.. now I know how stupid my question was...

Didn't thought about it.

Thanks!
